_source.short_desc: CareCloud Charts is a comprehensive, cloud-based Electronic Health Record solution that easily adapts to a practice's workflow.
_source.long_desc:
CareCloud Charts is a comprehensive, cloud-based Electronic Health Record solution that easily adapts to a practice's workflow. Charts helps physicians become more productive and profitable, while maintaining adaptability and adjusting to the frequent changes in healthcare reform.

Our MU-certified EHR that features real-time patient flows, rich patient summaries, built-in templates, and time-saving clinical documentation to help you treat more patients every day, more efficiently.
_source.target_audience:
Medical practices of all sizes looking to improve productivity, profitability, and patient care.
Our client base includes thousands of providers representing 50 states and more than 70 specialties.

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare is a leading healthcare software and services company that empowers the transformation of ambulatory care. Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

related_products.short_desc: Mental health EMR & therapy notes software for practices of all sizes. Lots of features and reports. Free 21 day trial
related_products.features:
EHR practice management software with Wiley Planners add-on, Telehealth for online therapy, mobile responsive interface, client portal, DSM/ICD codes, progress notes, treatment plans, discharge notes, review & co-sign notes, custom forms.  
Billing features: PQRS, claims & ERA/EOB, superbills, credit card service, batch invoice/claims.
Sync with Google/iCal. Voice, text, email reminders. 
Tons of reports included: Payroll, Staff Billing, etc. 
Unlimited document storage, unlimited support.

related_products.short_desc: Our award-winning EHR gives providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
related_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc: Experience best in class clinical tools on iPad, iPhone or web with full charting capability, lab ordering, e-prescribing and more.
related_products.features: Experience superior efficiency and health record integrity with seamlessly integrated cloud based EMR, patient engagement, and billing in DrChrono's integrated platform. Take your charting to the next level with best in class clinical tools on iPad, iPhone or web with full charting capability, along with telemedicine, lab ordering, e-prescribing and more. With pre-built customizable medical forms and smart shortcuts, you can speed up your charting and focus on your patient care.

related_products.short_desc: Enjoy patient data right at your fingertips. Order lab tests and prescriptions in just a few clicks. Stay MU compliant with NueMD EHR.
related_products.features: NueMDs ONC-ATCB Certified electronic health record offers secure, HIPAA-compliant access to internet based technology just like our practice management system. NueMD offers secure, HIPAA-compliant access to software that streamlines the patient care cycle and simplifies administrative tasks to just a few key strokes. Chart, code, and share information with other providers and lab systems simply and quickly. NueMDs established client base of over 24,000 users in 50 states is proof of our succes

related_products.short_desc: Document, schedule, bill, and market to your patients with WebPT, the leading software platform for outpatient physical therapists.
related_products.features: WebPT is the leading EMR software for outpatient physical, occupational, and speech therapy. With 40% market share, WebPT offers scheduling, documentation, billing, outcomes tracking, business reporting, patient engagement tools, and system integrations, WebPT's robust web-based solution is ideal for every outpatient setting regardless of staff size, facility type, or the number of specialties.

related_products.short_desc: AdvancedEHR: Save time & improve clinical outcomes with seamless data transfer, simple charting, ePrescribing, and telemedicine tools.
related_products.features: AdvancedMD EHR/EMR: Practice from anywhere. Run your entire practice from a single program, a single database and a single login. Seamless integration of your clinical & business technologies helps your staff chart, manage tasks, compare data & report for Meaningful Use or MACRA with ease. Our mobile IOS apps means you and your staff are never out of touch with your practice. Improve your physician/patient workflow with AdvancedEHR. Healthier practice = healthier patients.

related_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based EHR software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient experience. Affordable pricing, free setup and support.
related_products.features:
RXNT's cloud-based Electronic Health Records (EHR) software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient care experience. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care, as well as electronic referrals, medical scheduling, and integrated EPCS-certified E-Prescribing (eRx). Patients benefit from the ease of a patient engagement portal and check-in features.

RXNT's EMR solution is HIPAA compliant, supports MACRA and MIPS, and is an ONC certified HIT solution.

related_products.short_desc: CareLogic is web-based Electronic Health Record (EHR) system for behavioral health and human services organizations.
related_products.features: CareLogic is a web-based and easy-to-use Electronic Medical Record (EMR) platform designed for enterprise behavioral health and human services organizations with at least 40 users. Our highly configurable EHR platform helps improve outcomes, drive efficiencies and demonstrate performance. Capabilities include scheduling, intake, treatment planning, service documentation, ePrescribing, consumer engagement, telehealth, billing and reporting.

similar_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based EHR software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient experience. Affordable pricing, free setup and support.
similar_products.features:
RXNT's cloud-based Electronic Health Records (EHR) software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient care experience. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care, as well as electronic referrals, medical scheduling, and integrated EPCS-certified E-Prescribing (eRx). Patients benefit from the ease of a patient engagement portal and check-in features.

RXNT's EMR solution is HIPAA compliant, supports MACRA and MIPS, and is an ONC certified HIT solution.

similar_products.short_desc: Kareo a Tebra Company makes it easy to engage with your patients. Build notes and managing patient interactions simply with Kareo EHR!
similar_products.features: Kareo a Tebra Company offers a full-featured EHR designed by a practicing physician to fit the way you think and work. Kareo Clinical is MACRA Certified. Built for the iPad and the web, it gives you great flexibility and the freedom to stay connected with your patient during an exam. Kareo EHR is built for YOU - not just MU (although it's ONC-ACB Certified). Take the worries out of adopting an EHR with Kareo a Tebra Company.

TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

similar_products.short_desc: Connect and share current health information from medical records, labs, pharmacies, devices, apps, and patient portals
similar_products.features: Human API is a real-time health intelligence platform enabling companies to build new solutions that deliver better experiences to customers. We are powered by a robust and comprehensive data network that covers 270 million lives and we help organizations turn health data into insights that create new value for consumers and the companies that serve them.

similar_products.short_desc: Practice management, EHR, and billing services for behavioral, mental, and chemical health. Cloud-based, feature-rich, affordable.
similar_products.features: Feature- for-feature, the best value in EHRs.  Exclusively designed for behavioral and mental health providers, Procentive is trusted by thousands of providers to provide the software and services they need to manage their businesses, stay compliant, and be more effective.  Comprehensive, yet easy to use, Procentive EHR is cloud-based and ONC certified.

similar_products.short_desc: AlexiaHtC is a new and affordable EMR/EHR, that is, Internet electronic medical record/electronic health record.
similar_products.features: AlexiaHTC is a modern, integrated, and affordable medical application for solo doctors, small practices, and independent nurse practitioners: EMR/EHR, E-Prescribing, Telemedicine, Medical Billing, Imaging DICOM VIEWER, Laboratory Integration, Provider Connectivity, and Patient Access.

similar_products.short_desc: Fusion is an EMR built specifically to help OTs, PTs, & SLPs spend less time doing paperwork and more time treating patients.
similar_products.features:
From Pediatrics to Geriatrics, Fusion EMR does it all for PTs, OTs & SLPs Practices! Features include billing, scheduling, waitlists, insights, teletherapy, documentation, and more to streamline your clinic!

Thousands of therapists across the country trust Fusion's EMR to make them (and their practices) more efficient.

Sign up for a free demo of Fusion today to find out how you can spend less time doing paperwork and more time treating patients.

similar_products.short_desc: TriMed offers a fully integrated software suite including EHR, PM, Patient Portal, Mobile, Check-in Module, & Telemedicine.
similar_products.features: TriMed offers a complete software suite which includes Electronic Health Records, Practice Management, Patient Portal, Mobile, Check-in Module, and Telemedicine. Our products are fully integrated, so all modules seamlessly work together for your practice. Extremely robust. Very customizable. Template driven. We build our software around your workflow, not the other way around.

similar_products.short_desc: BirchNotes enables users to grow and manage their practice. Designed specifically for mental health and substance abuse providers.
similar_products.features: BirchNotes enables users to grow and manage their practice. Designed specifically for mental health and substance abuse providers. Reduce time at intake with the client portal. Manage individual and group appointments, and meet your clients in person or through integrated Telehealth. Complete quick and easy charting with smart-fill and speech to text functionality. Set up autopay and require payment prior to your session to increase revenue. Schedule a demo today to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: TenEleven's electronic Clinical Record (eCR) solution provides the framework to thrive in a performance-based payment system.
similar_products.features: TenEleven Group is a software and services company, focused on providing solutions for health and human services agencies to manage their end-to-end business process. electronic Clinical Record (eCR) is an enterprise-level EHR solution for agencies with more than 10 users and provides solutions for a variety of service types. Inpatient, Outpatient, Community Based Services, and Medication-Assisted Treatment with medication dispensing functionality and dedicated billing services.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Chiropractic software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Chiropractic tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Chiropractic software automates practice management, billing, scheduling, patient care and reporting for chiropractic offices. Chiropractic offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of chiropractic SOAP notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, chiropractic practice management, electronic claims, collections and financial reporting. Chiropractic software is related to other Capterra directories like: Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Physical Therapy software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Dental software manages dental practice operations including billing, accounting, and scheduling. Dental offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Dental office software also typically offers a variety of data tools such as periodontal charting and three dimensional rendering or other visualization tools. Dental software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Medical Billing software manages patient billing and collections for the medical industry. Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

Medical Transcription software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software and Medical Practice Management software.

_source.short_desc: (RCM), practice management, electronic health record (EHR), business intelligence, telehealth, patient experience management.
_source.long_desc: CareCloud, Inc. brings disciplined innovation to the business of healthcare. Our suite of technology-enabled solutions helps clients increase financial and operational performance, streamline clinical workflows, and make better business and care decisions. More than 40,000 providers across the United States count on CareCloud to help them improve patient care while reducing administrative burdens and operating costs.
_source.target_audience:
Medical practices of all sizes looking to improve productivity, profitability, and patient care.
Our client base includes thousands of providers representing 50 states and more than 70 specialties.

category_features.name: Automated Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedules are automatically created based on business need and employee availability and qualifications

category_features.name: Calendar Sync
category_features.definition: Synchronize with other calendars to view mutual availability and schedules

category_features.name: Client Database
category_features.definition: Electronic storage of stakeholder contact information

category_features.name: Confirmation/Reminders
category_features.definition: Automated alerts to upcoming appointments

category_features.name: Group Scheduling
category_features.definition: Automatically find mutually available meeting time slots across multiple calendars

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Location
category_features.definition: Business with more than one location/store

category_features.name: Online Booking
category_features.definition: End users can schedule appointments online

category_features.name: Online Payments
category_features.definition: Payment webpage where clients can pay bills

category_features.name: Recurring Appointments
category_features.definition: Schedule repeating appointments based on a duration of time

category_features.name: Room Booking
category_features.definition: Reserve available meeting space to avoid conflicts and  to inform everyone involved on where their meetings will be held

category_features.name: Accounts Receivable
category_features.definition: Track outstanding invoices and the money owed from clients

category_features.name: Claims Management
category_features.definition: Process of submitting and following up on claims with insurance companies

category_features.name: EHR/EMR Integration
category_features.definition: Allows integration with Electronic Medical Records (EMR) and Electronic Health Records (EHR) systems

category_features.name: For Healthcare
category_features.definition: Caters to the healthcare industry

category_features.name: ICD-10 Compliance
category_features.definition: Manage the intricacies of ICD-10 cataloging and ensure clinic compliance

category_features.name: Insurance Eligibility Verification
category_features.definition: Checking eligibility of patients for different insurance claims.

category_features.name: Medical Billing
category_features.definition: Manage billing and payments for a healthcare provider

category_features.name: Patient Intake
category_features.definition: Patients can register for appointments in advance online

category_features.name: Patient Portal
category_features.definition: A website and login where patients can access information such as health care records, treatment plants, etc.

category_features.name: Patient Scheduling
category_features.definition: Book and manage patient appointments and follow-ups

category_features.name: Payment Collection
category_features.definition: Track and manage customer payments that are overdue

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Meet the personal scheduling assistant that works 24/7 behind the scenes to fill your calendar & take busywork off your plate. From the moment clients book with you, Acuity is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations to you and your clients, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments or accept donations. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly even as business get busier. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your schedule, get booked 24/7, send automated reminders, manage memberships, securely process payments & more. Starts at $25/mo
related_products.features: Boost your productivity and free up time with Vagaro Salon, Spa & Fitness Appointment Scheduling Software. Schedule appointments from a desktop or use our App to manage clients on the go. Get booked on our marketplace, your booking page, Facebook, Yelp, Instagram or on your own website via our booking widget. Send automated reminders and emails. Securely process payments. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Pricing starts @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Housecall Pro is a top-rated business solution for home service professionals to streamline scheduling, dispatching, payments, & more.
related_products.features:
Call now to get up to 80% off your first month: 855-921-4757.

Easily Schedule Jobs, Assign Team Members, and Set Arrival Windows in only a few clicks. Housecall Pro is an all-in-one Field Service management app that helps automate business processes and workflows. Trusted by over 25,000 home service companies.

related_products.short_desc: SimplePractice is the #1 HIPAA compliant practice management software. Join 100000+ thriving health & wellness professionals.
related_products.features:
The all-in-one practice management solution for private practitioners. Practitioners who switched to SimplePractice spent 35% less time on scheduling each week. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. Send paperless intakes and insurance forms.  Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. 
Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest.
Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify appointment scheduling and automate reminders with Mindbody scheduling software and streamline business management.
related_products.features: Mindbody business management software elevates your client experience, from "Hello" to "See you Tuesday!" Step up to seamless online booking, automated marketing, integrated payment processing, and robust reporting. Set your brand apart with a customized app and stop missing calls (and clients) with an AI-powered front desk. Turn new leads into loyal customers with integrated lead management. Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Calendly is the world's #1 scheduling tool. It eliminates the hassle of back-and-forth emails and syncs with your entire team.
related_products.features: Calendly makes scheduling meetings easy and efficient, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. Already recognized as the intuitive scheduling leader for more than 10 million people around the world, Calendly also offers extended capabilities for teams with powerful collaboration functionality, robust administration controls, and enterprise-grade security and compliance. Integrations with Zoom, Salesforce, Google, Microsoft, Slack, & more.

related_products.short_desc: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks, like scheduling meetings, quick and easy.
related_products.features: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks like scheduling and organizing meetings fast and easy. The worlds leader in online scheduling, doodle.com is used by over 30 million people each month. Doodle AG is headquartered in Zurich.

related_products.short_desc: Fresha is world's leading appointment booking software and is totally subscription-free!
related_products.features: Fresha is the world's leading booking software for appointment scheduling and is totally subscription-free! Join 70,000+ businesses and 250,000 professionals who use Fresha to boost their sales in 120+ countries. Fresha is a simple, flexible and powerful booking software with all the advanced features you need to run your business. Optional paid features include integrated payment processing, deposits and no-show protection. Only pay for what you use, with zero monthly fees.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you need to manage and grow your brand from a fully-integrated singular platform. You can?t be great without integrate!
related_products.features: Enjoy the fruits of a busy schedule . When it comes to business, time is money. Scheduling allows you to maximize your time and revenue by giving you full control over your schedule, staff, services and more. Create your free account today to learn more and explore plans and pricing.

related_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for all service companies! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.
related_products.features: SimplyBook.me offers the most extensive online booking system on the market, one that makes you look professional and solves all your online needs. You get a full blown booking website, or a widget for your own website, where you can present your business and accept appointments, sell products, membership, packs, gift cards and service add-ons. Manage your business with one solution; website, accept bookings, marketing initiatives, business statistics and,online and on site payments (POS).

similar_products.short_desc: Meet Dayful, the software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you can focus on what matters most to you.
similar_products.features: Meet Dayful, the all-in-one software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you have more time to focus on what matters most to you. Let clients easily book appointments 24/7 online or with a handy mobile app-and reduce no-shows with automated confirmations & reminders. Better manage your business with a powerful calendar, time-saving automations and features built with your clients in mind. Be the best kind of busy with Dayful.

similar_products.short_desc: TimeTap is a feature-rich, highly customizable appointment scheduling tool trusted by esteemed organizations around the world.
similar_products.features: TimeTap automates appointment scheduling and related tasks while solving custom and complex booking needs. We offer more than standard features, such as custom appointment confirmations and reminders. With TimeTap, you get a HIPAA & GDPR compliant tool that can collect and store client information, integrate multiple staff calendars into a single booking page, avoid double booking with two-way calendar sync, and calculate travel time between appointments & automatically adjust your availability.

similar_products.features: Let clients schedule a free consultation, book and pay for services, and register for events online - 24/7 from any device. Ideal for small businesses, local service providers and consultants, vcita comes with a customizable scheduling page where clients can view your services and up-to-date availability, as well as a personal client portal. It easily connects to your website, local listing, email and social media, driving you more leads and sales.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use and affordable telehealth solution. Unlimited video calls, messaging, file-sharing, and recording for only 24/mo/provider.
similar_products.features: HIPAA Video is the leader in online healthcare communications. We equip Providers and healthcare professionals with a simple, customizable video solution that meets their telehealth needs. We understand the importance of HIPAA Compliance and provide only the most secure channels for handling sensitive and private information. We provide our award-winning service with no strings attached. You are in no obligation to sign long-term contracts and we will never ask you for your credit card to start.

similar_products.short_desc: AI Patient Attendance Predictor, Digital Forms, Telehealth, Appointment Reminders, & Patient Self-Scheduling. #1 Customer Rated!
similar_products.features: Best for 11+ Provider Groups. AI Patient Attendance Predictor, Appointment Reminders, & Scheduling: Mend's PredictiveIQ is the industry's first-ever patent-pending AI that predicts no-shows and cancellations before they happen with up to 99% accuracy. In combination with smart text, email, and phone call appointment reminders make your schedule REAL. Mend also offers robust scheduling and patient self-scheduling/re-scheduling. Mend integrates with most EHRs

similar_products.short_desc: Square Appointments is an all-in-one scheduling POS for booking, payments, and team management.
similar_products.features: Running a business is hard enough, especially if you're juggling multiple tools to do different things. Square Appointments is an integrated POS that comes with online scheduling and payment processing so that you can run your whole business from one place. It's a one-stop-shop solution that helps you save time and stay organized because it's customized for businesses who run on appointments. Square Appointments is now free for individuals, and really affordable for teams.

similar_products.short_desc: Waitwhile is a simpler way to schedule appointments. Centrally manage calendars and automate custom appointment reminders through email
similar_products.features: Give time back to your customers and staff with Waitwhile's simple and flexible appointment scheduling solution. Centrally manage calendars and automate custom appointment reminders through email and/or SMS to reduce no-show rates.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scheduling software automates the scheduling of events, employees, rooms and other resources. Organizations use these applications to manage the planning of internal and external activities. Typically Scheduling software provides tools such as a shared calendar providing real-time project, task, employee and resource scheduling as well as a variety of forecasting, allocation and resource management features. Often other details, such as resource categorization, location details, timesheet records and employee skill-sets can be edited, updated and managed from the scheduling interface. Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Facility Management software and Appointment Scheduling software.
